info.author: YL
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Lesser General Public License v3 or later (LGPLv3+)
info.description:
# pterminal
A simple, light-weight input/output library for pipe terminal in new thread

# Usage
## create and start
```
pthread = pterminal.Thread()
pthread.start()
```

## listen the pipe output/error
```
def on_pipe_out(self, sender, txtout):
    print(txtout)

def on_pipe_err(self, sender, txterr):
    print(txterr)

pthread.on(pterminal.SIGNAL_OUT, on_pipe_out)
pthread.on(pterminal.SIGNAL_ERR, on_pipe_err)
```

## exit thread
```
pthread.terminate()
```
info.name: pterminal
info.html_description:
pterminal

A simple, light-weight input/output library for pipe terminal in new thread

Usage

create and start

pthread = pterminal.Thread()
pthread.start()

listen the pipe output/error

def on_pipe_out(self, sender, txtout):
    print(txtout)

def on_pipe_err(self, sender, txterr):
    print(txterr)

pthread.on(pterminal.SIGNAL_OUT, on_pipe_out)
pthread.on(pterminal.SIGNAL_ERR, on_pipe_err)

exit thread

pthread.terminate()
